verses.name: Isaiah 50:7
verses.text: For the Lord God will help me; therefore shall I not be confounded: therefore have I set my face like a flint, and I know that I shall not be ashamed.

verses.name: Isaiah 50:8
verses.text: He is near that justifieth me; who will contend with me? let us stand together: who is mine adversary? let him come near to me.

verses.name: Isaiah 50:9
verses.text: Behold, the Lord God will help me; who is he that shall condemn me? lo, they all shall wax old as a garment; the moth shall eat them up.
